about_the_game:
GAMEPLAY & FEATURES


  • Multi-choice, single-ending social strategy sim with 1+ hours till credits
  • Simple one-click combat for a faster, more story-focused game
  • Time is split into morning, noon, and night—with just one main action possible each changeover!
  • Interact with Lily and Mina to boost Affinity
  • Go on missions to earn Contribution, all while defending against the horde’s attacks

STORY

As savage tribes besiege your village, the fate of two friends hangs in the balance!

CHARACTERS



Lily Every
Likes: You, lychees, berries, and hedgehogs

Your friend and Mina’s closest companion.
Won’t stop thinking about you around the clock.
Obsessed with the idea you two are meant to be,
even daydreaming about married life in the bath...
Increasingly frustrated that you haven’t sealed the deal.


Mina Shaath
Likes: Pineapple, swimming at the beach, and dancing

Another friend and Lily’s closest companion.
Likes you too, but stays quiet out of loyalty to Lily.
Her pushy attitude whenever you’re alone with her
only makes her true feelings that much more obvious.
Has an older sister and hates all things unclean. Also, scarabs.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains occasional crude humor, crass language. All love interests are 18 years of age or older.

name: Pillaged Village: Humbled by Savages
short_description: Uh-oh, those marauding barbarians are back, banging on the village gates! It’s high time you bore arms and showed those savages who’s boss... After all, not one but TWO childhood sweethearts are counting on you to save the day—godspeed, soldier!
